name: Save the Muckens!
description:
Enter the caves to start playing the different levels and trying bring back the Muckens to the village!

Controls (keyboard & mouse):

  • Move: WASD
  • Rotate camera: Mouse
  • Jump and double jump: Space
  • Sprint: Shift
  • Pause: Scape

Controls (Controller):

  • Move: Left Joystick
  • Rotate camera: Right Joystick
  • Jump and double jump: A (Xbox) - X (Playstation)
  • Sprint: LB (Xbox) - L1(Playstation)
  • Pause: Menu (XBox) - Start(Playstation)

Credits:

Programmer: Chipi

Game and Level Desing: Oslan & Toberen

Modeling: Oslan & Toberen

Music: DeepHeroes
